content.paragraph: When you first join an Online Group, complete the following steps:

numberedlist.listitem:
visit your Profile and:
create a new password to secure your access to this website (record your login name and password in a secure but accessible place)
create a bio for yourself
make sure your email address/es are specified correctly
create a bookmark (favourite) for this site in your Web browser (so you can easily find your way back here)
visit your Online Group's Home page - make sure you are famliar with the Purpose, Membership and Participation Protocol as they define what the Online Group is for and what is appropriate there
add the Online Group's email address to your email address book (use this to address emails to the group)

bulletlist.listitem: read the Basic Participation section in this Participation Guide
read the Effective Participation section in the Participation Guide
experiment in your Online Group — make a post just to say hello and see who replies — if you have any comments or questions, post them to the Online Group.
